sub_title: Product Owner @ Open Food Chain | Enabling Blockchain-based Provenance in AgriFood
summary:
MBA graduate (Amsterdam Business School, University of Amsterdam) with a passion for leveraging technology to optimize processes in a sustainable manner to maximise the value-add for Producers and Consumers. Diverse experience and perspective within the modern Supply Chains through Dell and Tiqets.

Experience working as a lead developer (full-stack) and point-of-contact for the .NET based User Interface for a business-critical supply chain application, enabling reporting and status based communication with vendors and logistics along with rapid integration of dynamic product lines and development methodologies to inculcate innovation and digital transformation. Responsible for working with business-facing teams to provide highly stable, scalable, and reliable customer order fulfilment and enablement applications and facilitating interlock communications and support related activities.

Involved with another team as a multi-faceted developer handling aspects ranging from UX Design to full-stack implementation of tools to enable real-time analytics and reporting for the global supply chain. Responsible for maintaining and agile development of business requirements to provide a feature-driven approach toward deliverables.

Closely worked with the UR team for onboarding, providing networking and enrichment opportunities to the university hires, and enabling mentorship opportunities for a smooth transition from the college to the corporate environment.

school.name: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School
Delhi Public School - R. K. Puram

certifications.name: Ministry of AYUSH (Govt. of India) certified Yoga Wellness Instructor

profile_positions.description:
As a Product Owner, I am responsible for the commercial and technical implementation for our strategic clients, ensuring they get the most out of the OFC technology while maximising efficiency for all participants in the supply chain.
Other responsibilities include - Prompting, analysing and specifying functional/non-functional requirements from Product Owners, external and internal stakeholders; Requirements finalisation with POD Leads, Product Owners, and development team; Backlog management: prioritising, grooming, planning, and support during implementation; Requirements change handling
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
Manager in the Commercial Excellence team focused on the OTA Supply Chain, translating data insights, supplier feedback and industry trends into the teams' short and long-term priorities. Analysed and reported on the commercial performance of all major regional destinations across the globe.

Implemented Supplier Segmentation Model: created a Supplier segmentation model that incorporated various criteria to assess the stage of the supplier in the supplier lifecycle while also incorporating the most popular segmentation techniques like Kraljic's Purchasing Portfolio Matrix and the Supplier Potential Matrix.

Implemented Semi-automated Lead Enrichment: worked on the development with an external partner and implementation of a semi-automated lead enrichment system that helped the sales team identify high-quality leads more efficiently and effectively, with a roadmap to automate the process, to further streamline the sales process and make it more efficient.

Analytics: created several analytics dashboards for the Supply vertical, providing insights into the company's performance and making data-driven decisions with several reporting and automation features implemented.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Excellence Manager

profile_positions.description:
Manager Intern in the Commercial Excellence team focused on the OTA Supply Chain, translating data insights, supplier feedback and industry trends into the teams' short and long-term priorities. Analysed and reported on the commercial performance of all major regional destinations across the globe.

Managed projects within the supplier life cycle engaging with a broad range of stakeholders, project scoping, research, identifying gaps in offerings and developing clear processes. 
Supported supplier development projects by finding creative solutions, understanding the partner journey map and identifying solutions for a smooth partner experience. 
Deployed and managed dashboards for Supplier Success and Supplier Acquisition using Google Looker. 
Worked with departments across the company, including marketing and project management, in developing new ideas, initiatives, products, and services.
Performed User Interviews and Market Analysis for implementing the Support Infrastructure for the OTA Suppliers using a tiered approach to segementation and support.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Excellence Intern

company.name: Kanha Realcon Pvt. Ltd. & Rudraksh Finance Company Pvt. Ltd.

profile_positions.company: Kanha Realcon Pvt. Ltd. & Rudraksh Finance Company Pvt. Ltd.
profile_positions.description:
Leveraged synergies between both businesses to buttress the triple bottom line by preparing an investment optimization plan to gauge the viability and compatibility with existing businesses

Performed real estate analysis for properties in North India, with a regional focus on agricultural and residential land in West Uttar Pradesh, NCR, and Rajasthan and provided recommendation list for medium and long-term investments in residential real estate, while also suggesting properties ripe for conversion to commercial land

Devised an investment maturity timeline with projections for expected gains while accounting for
changing real estate scenarios in up-and-coming areas, averaging 22.53% total returns
profile_positions.title: Strategic Business Consultant (Real Estate)

profile_positions.description:
Global Point of Contact for UI working with teams across Malaysia, Ireland, Poland and Brazil. Responsible for developing and maintaining the application on a technology stack that uses .Net Framework (C#), Oracle DB, Oracle BPEL, HTML, CSS and interacts with a whole host of endpoints from services to upstream and downstream applications to enable order orchestration through the channel application. Aligned with agile development practices to deliver secure and stable applications and updating the existing infrastructure to meet the current industry standards.

UX Developer, with full-stack capabilities, in the analytics and reporting team for the global supply chain and manufacturing with the aim to provide robust, ML-based solutions for real-world business use cases, working on C# (MVC and .NET Core), Python, Power BI, Figma/InVision Studio, GitLab and TFS. Also working on SSRS Reporting and Oracle PL/SQL to enable quick and accurate reporting and analysis from data.

Member of the IT Masters Program at Dell and Advisor to the IT Development Program India Council across Hyderabad and Bengaluru.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer 2

profile_positions.description:
Ex-Lead the Networking Committee of the IT Development Program for 250+ university hires from across the country to enable them to make the most of the global networking and enrichment events while driving the mentorship program with a focus on cross-organisational learning opportunities.

Responsible for interfacing with the CSR counterparts in various establishments to organise activities and events to give back to the city and the people.

Working in tandem with leads and advisors of other committees to help onboard new interns and university hires, helping them acclimate better to the corporate world.

Currently in the IT Masters Program, working in an advisory capacity to the next batch of the leads for IT Development Program India Council across Hyderabad and Bengaluru.
profile_positions.title: IT Development Program India Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Software Development Engineer - Undergradute Intern II

Worked on AI-based self-learning virtual support assistant for supply chain management interfacing applications using Python with various ML and deep learning libraries, Spring Boot, Pivotal Cloud Foundry, NoSQL DBs, Postman, Github, Oracle BPEL, etc. to create an on-premises solution to facilitate business users.
